import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Flippy, { FrontSide, BackSide } from 'react-flippy'; import { Container, Col, Row, Table,Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; class CreateUser extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ isFlipped:false }; this.handleClick=this.handleClick.bind(this); } handleClick(e) { e.preventDefault(); this.setState(prevState=>({isFlipped:!prevState.isFlipped})); } render() { return ( this.flippy = r} style={{ width: '400px', height: '400px',marginTop:"50px",marginLeft:"150px" }} >






Username:
password:

); } } export default CreateUser;
